column2: Auto recovery due to replacement with a new Main Controller PCB, which is a service part.
Auto recovery due to replacement with a used Main Controller PCB.
Error in temperature rising of Fixing Assembly
Temperature of the Fixing Assembly did not reach a certain temperature within the specified period of time.

1. Check the connection of connectors between the Fixing Assembly and the Engine Controller PCB. 2.If the connector at the Fixing Assembly side does not have induction while the assembly is removed, replace the assembly. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Abnormal high temperature of Fixing Assembly
It was detected that the temperature of the Fixing Assembly was abnormally high.

1. Check the connection of connectors between the Fixing Assembly and the Engine Controller PCB. 2. If the connector at the Fixing Assembly side does not have induction while the assembly is removed, replace the assembly. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Abnormal low temperature of Fixing Assembly
After Heater turns on, Main Thermistor detected a temperature of 120 deg C or lower for more than 20 seconds.

1. Check the connection of connectors between the Fixing Assembly and the Engine Controller PCB. 2. If the connector at the Fixing Assembly side does not have induction while the assembly is removed, replace the assembly. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Error in fixing power supply drive circuit
Error in either the Fixing Heater or the Main Motor

1. Check the connection of connectors between the Fixing Assembly and the Engine Controller PCB. 2. If the connector at the Fixing Assembly side does not have induction while the assembly is removed, replace the assembly. 3. Reconnect the connector on the Main Motor. 4. Replace the Main Motor. 5. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Error is detected in the Laser Scanner or the Scanner Motor.
1. Reconnect the connector on Laser Scanner Unit. 2. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit.
The Laser Scanner did not become ready although a specified period of time had passed.
1. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. 2. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
An error occurred when writing/reading data to/from the ROM.
An error occurred when writing/reading data to/from the ROM.
An error occurred when writing/reading data to/from the ROM.
An error occurred when writing/reading data to/from the ROM.
Communication error occurred after normal startup.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Invalid combination of language file versions
Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
Install the firmware according to the model
Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
Install the firmware according to the model
Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
Install the firmware according to the model

Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
Install the firmware according to the model
Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
Install the firmware according to the model
Error in communication with the Wireless LAN Board
Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
1. Check the connection of the Wireless LAN Board. 2. Install the firmware according to the model 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Mismatch of the model for which the firmware was downloaded is detected.
1. Install the firmware according to the model 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Install the firmware according to the model Replace the Main Controller PCB.
An error due to the controller software occurred so that print could not be proceeded.
Due to firmware error, the possibility of solving the error by replacing the Main Controller PCB is low. Check the downloaded firmware again.
1. Check the Main Fan or the connector. 2. Replace the Main Fan 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
